Place To REST
Anywhere

The world's first foldable, waterproof seat cushion that fits into a backpack
Shop More detailed

Why podpop?

Embrace the Outdoors like Never Beforepodpop is designed with every urban explorer in mind.

Whether you're a student looking for a comfy spot to read in the park, a traveler exploring new cities, or a parent watching your kids play, podpop makes sure you're doing it in comfort and style.

Full size 32x26 cm is suitable for adults and children

Podpop is foldable & it fits into a regular backpack

The weight of the cushion starts from 240 grams (for the classic version)

Each cushion comes with a carrying case and strap, and two carabiners for portability

We use special fabric commonly used on boats

Our cushions are versatile, durable, and, most importantly, they empower you to make the most of your outdoor moments.

We've poured our hearts into creating a product that seamlessly blends into your active lifestyle, ensuring that whenever you step out the door, podpop is there to enhance your experience.

Say goodbye to the days of sitting on uncomfortable surfaces or endlessly searching for seating options. With podpop, you're always just a fold away from ultimate comfort.

Why Choose podpop?

Podpop isn't just another seat cushion. It's a game-changer for outdoor enthusiasts.
Whether you're an urban adventurer, a park-goer, or simply someone who appreciates the little comforts in life, here's how podpop elevates your outdoor experience:

Compact Size, Immeasurable Comfort
Once unfolded, podpop transforms into a full-size cushion measuring 32x26 centimeters. It’s small when you don’t need it and perfectly sized when you do
Sit Anywhere, Anytime
From cold, hard concrete steps to uneven, grassy fields, podpop lets you claim your spot comfortably.
Keep your clothes clean
Who says functional gear can't be an eye catcher? With podpop, add a pop of color to your outdoor gear with ease
Which podpop suits me?
Comparing Different Versions of our cushion

Designed for Maximum Ease of Use

Compact and Convenient

Our cushions fold down into a small size of about 3.5 liters, easily slipping into your backpack. Unfolded, they expand into a full-size cushion, ensuring you have a comfortable seat wherever you land.

Built to Last

Utilizing water-resistant and UV-protected fabric, akin to what's used on boats, each cushion promises durability, easy cleaning, and quick drying. Say goodbye to the dread of getting your gear wet or faded.

Light as a Feather

Our cushions are surprisingly lightweight, starting from a mere 240 grams for the classic version — equivalent to carrying a smartphone. You’ll hardly notice it’s there until you need it.

Accessorize for Ease

Each podpop cushion comes equipped with accessories like 2 carabiners, making it a breeze to carry. We've thought through the little details to enhance your overall experience.

Unfold Comfort with podpop
Podpop is the ultimate accessory for anyone who loves being outside in the city
Whether you're attending open-air events, picnicking in the park, or just looking for a comfortable spot to read your book, our cushions provide a stylish and practical solution.

About us

We believe that the most important thing in any endeavor is the idea

Our story began with the simple desire to have a comfortable seat while enjoying walks and travels. This led us to create podpop, inspired by the idea of "just sitting anywhere."

Tag us in your posts and follow our social media accounts to stay in touch with us. Keep connected!
